org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.net

Class BasicInetPeer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.net.BasicInetPeer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.net.Peer

    public class BasicInetPeer
extends Object
implements org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.net.Peer
    Represents a peer that we communicate with by using a basic Socket that has no associated Channel.
